creator: jonathan_gifford@yahoo.com
text:
The two properties ant.build.javac.target and ant.build.javac.source are not set as documented.    This appears to be confirmed by a quick scan of the source code for ant.build.javac.target and BUILD_JAVAC_TARGET.

C:\temp>more javac.target.xml
<project name="build-common" default="show.props">

    <target name="show.props">
        <echo>
    ant version:     ${ant.version}
    JDK version:     ${ant.java.version}
    javac.source  ${ant.build.javac.source}
          target  ${ant.build.javac.target}
        </echo>
    </target>

</project>

C:\temp>ant -f javac.target.xml
Buildfile: C:\temp\javac.target.xml

show.props:
     [echo]
     [echo]     ant version:     Apache Ant(TM) version 1.9.4 compiled on April 29 2014
     [echo]     JDK version:     1.6
     [echo]     javac.source  ${ant.build.javac.source}
     [echo]           target  ${ant.build.javac.target}
     [echo]

BUILD SUCCESSFUL
Total time: 0 seconds

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
This is a misunderstanding.

The properties are not set by Ant.  You can set them to provide default values for javac's target and source attributes where they are not set explicitly.
